alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 23 at 2:01AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON MDT TODAY THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Fergus County. * WHEN...From Noon MDT today through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Fergus County below 4500ft; Snowy and Judith Mountains
